channel.title: [PI] Changing damage rates?
channel.description: ok so basicly i need to make ppl hit higher vs people. idk what happened but i tested out max str gear which hit a 800 on npcs, but after like 100 hits my max was a 320 on a person. ive been searching all through the combat assistant and cant find anything on a overall damage rate. i could just make certain items hit higher... but i dont wanna do that for every item in the source. got any ideas?
